citadels

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.model.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class representing a player in the Citadels game. Handles shared functionality for both human and AI players.

      • canBuildDistrict

        protected java.lang.String canBuildDistrict(DistrictCard card)
        Checks if the player is allowed to build the given district. This checks build limits, gold, duplicates, and Quarry rules.
        Parameters:
        card - the district card player wants to build
        Returns:
        null if buildable, otherwise a reason message why it's not

      • getBuildCost

        card - the district to build
        Returns:
        cost to build after modifiers

        Abstract method to build a district. Must be implemented by subclasses.

        Returns:

      • hasAllDistrictTypes

        public boolean hasAllDistrictTypes(java.util.List<DistrictCard> built,
                                   int finalRoundNumber)
        Checks if a city qualifies for color bonus (all 5 district types). Haunted City may be used to cover 1 missing type unless built last round.
        Parameters:
        built - list of districts in city
        finalRoundNumber - round number of last round
        Returns:
        true if all types present (or 4 + Haunted City)

      • checkParkBonus

        public void checkParkBonus()
        Triggers the Park effect if player has no cards and has Park built. Draws 2 cards and shows them if player is human.

        protected void useAbility()
        Triggers character-based abilities for gold income and card draw. Handles Architect and bonuses for colored districts.

        Parameters:

        districtIndex - index of the district to destroy
        Returns:
